title: Topics – The Ark, the Kingdom, and Hidden Scriptures
content: Series hub covering the Ark of the Covenant prophecies, Jewish roots, true Israel, Jesus and the Kingdom within, removed texts, and earliest scriptures.

title: Part 1 — The Prophecy & the Ark of the Covenant
content: Ark mystery, Jeremiah 3:16, 2 Maccabees 2:4–8 Mount Nebo tradition, Isaiah 2 Micah 4 restoration of Zion, Luke 17:21 Kingdom within, John 2:19–21 true Temple, new covenant on hearts Jer 31:33 Heb 8:10. Conditions before the Ark can be revealed and why it matters.
